mapper.sql: OPERATION_ID, RESOURCE_ID, OPERATION_KEY, OPERATION_NAME, OPERATION_DESC, DEPEND_KEY, DEPEND_BY_KEY, METADATA_ID, DOMAIN, ORDER_KEY
mapper.select:
select
from sec_operation where 1 = 1 order by OPERATION_ID desc
mapper.delete: delete from sec_operation where OPERATION_ID = #{operationId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into sec_operation
OPERATION_ID,
RESOURCE_ID,
OPERATION_KEY,
OPERATION_NAME,
OPERATION_DESC,
DEPEND_KEY,
DEPEND_BY_KEY,
METADATA_ID,
DOMAIN,
ORDER_KEY,

mapper.update: update sec_operation set OPERATION_ID = #{operationId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, OPERATION_KEY = #{operationKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATION_NAME = #{operationName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATION_DESC = #{operationDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPEND_KEY = #{dependKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPEND_BY_KEY = #{dependByKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, METADATA_ID = #{metadataId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOMAIN = #{domain, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey, jdbcType=INTEGER} where OPERATION_ID = #{operationId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sec_operation
OPERATION_ID = #{operationId, jdbcType=BIGINT},
RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId, jdbcType=BIGINT},
OPERATION_KEY = #{operationKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATION_NAME = #{operationName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATION_DESC = #{operationDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPEND_KEY = #{dependKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPEND_BY_KEY = #{dependByKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
METADATA_ID = #{metadataId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOMAIN = #{domain, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey, jdbcType=INTEGER},
where OPERATION_ID = #{operationId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
